text: “mata kisima deyak gana dukak naha.
ithin mama me kathawa wen karanne thamange hakiyawan gana awishwasa karana hama ganu lamayektamayi.
monawahari liyala yanna
me sandaha athikarana deshiya wagawim ki්rayawaliya meheyawimada athulath we.
kohomahari handawe kiyapu widihata gana labuna.
mokada oya dewal prayogika nowana nisa.
ema pakshaye madhya pa්rakashaka mohomang musammil mahatha kolambaa ada pawathi madhya hamuwakata ekwemin me bawa prakasha kara atha.
"anuwa mehata waren.......
kolambaa kawuthukagaraye thibena shri wikrama rajasinha ge sinhasana asala awatharayak gawane bawa ada derana nalikawe kamarawakata asuwima4.
me pelapali giyata illim dina ganna labena ekak na.
ese athul wana snayu saha rudhira wahini kramanukulawa anukhandika walata bedi yayi.
mama nam dan hithanawa me gana api katha kala athi kiyala...//
